column5: Sleded and I took the day today to target pike. It was tough fishing but we managed 4 snot rockets for our efforts and missed 2 more. All of them were caught on a perch colored X Rap.. the key to making them hit was LONG pauses. 30 - 40 seconds before twitching the bait. It's Sleded's birthday tomorrow so he got a couple of real nice presents.
nice fish boys HAPPY BIRTHDAY SLEDED

Nice job guys!  The perch xrap has also been doing well for me when targeting pike.  The same technique you mentioned worked well in the frigid water.  Long pause, super slow retreive.  I lost two yesterday and one today.  This weather could spell the end of soft water pike until spring though.  I checked out your episodes of Action Angling yesterday and I must say you have quite the show there.  I'm not sure how far you are looking to persue it but I've got a buddy that can produce, film and edit who might be interested in taking it to the next step.  Corn Nug
Had a blast out there rich on the snot rockets! Ice is coming hopefully be drilling holes next weekend!!
nice report!  Happy bday sleded!  CHeers!
hey guys way to go...mmmmmmm pike for dinner what time should we be there i will bring the white wine for dinner..lol...lol
Nice shooting guys.  Happy B-day sleded.
You should have photoshopped out the puddle in that last pic. Now everyone knows.  Oh yeah.........nice lookin pike!
Good work on the pike boys   Happy B-Day Sleded!!
NICE SNOT ROCKETS LOL!!!   Happy Birthday SledEd.
happy B-day.  Man that is some serious green grass for mid january
HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHA!!! the quote of the year for 2007!!! LOL...   Seriously laughing my pants off!  LOL  Gerritt.
Hope you didn't wake the neighbours with crying snotties. Crap, Thought I was urban..........
Touche'  My pike have "Smart Cars" in the background.  Yours have Mercedes SUV and soccer moms late for a manicure.  Either way, we are hardcore
